prepared_by: Ramirez Structural Inc — Jose Ramirez, PE
description: Steel column-to-beam connection typical details. Shows base plate plans (A, B, C) with anchor bolt specs, fillet weld size table, beam seat detail, stiffener plate detail, and optional Hilti expansion anchor note. Upper half has details; lower half is blank.
key_content: Base plate Plan A: 1/2" thick on 1-1/2" min non-shrink grout, 4-1/2" DIA A.B.'s with DBL nuts
Base plate Plan B: 1/2" x (steel column + 3/4"), 2-1/2" DIA A.B.'s with DBL nuts
Plan B note: USE 18" LONG A.B.'s AT 6" CONC. CURBS AND WHERE SHEAR PANELS OCCUR
Fillet weld min sizes: to 1/4" = 1/8", over 1/4" to 1/2" = 3/16", over 1/2" to 3/4" = 1/4", over 3/4" = 5/16"
Optional: 1/2" DIA Hilti Kwik Bolts TZ expansion anchors, 5" embedment (ESR-1917, LARR #25701) with special inspection in lieu of cast-in-place
Stiffener PL 3/8" each side at beam end
Cap PL flange (6P MIN) x BM flange width w/ 4-3/4" DIA M.B.'s
Column cap plate PL 3/4", side plates 3/4" x 3" ea. side w/ 2-3/4" DIA M.B.S
Non-shrink grout: 1-1/2" min at all column bases
APPROVED: City of Long Beach, BADD326126, 10/29/25, Anthony Montez
NOT SHOWN: Foundation bolt spacing specs

drawing_zones.content: Column-to-beam elevation detail: cap plate, side plates, beam seat angle, column continuation
Base plate Plans A, B, C with anchor bolt specs, column per plan elevation, fillet weld table, Hilti expansion anchor optional note
Beam end/stiffener detail with PL 3/8" stiffeners, cap plate flange detail, column per plan view
Title block: Ramirez Structural Inc, project info, sheet S3.4
City of Long Beach APPROVED stamp — BADD326126, 10/29/25
